analysis.description:
FollowCoinTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x41d9384dc97470bd2afa06db0c1be4f872519eec.sol#366-397) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokenReward.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0

FollowCoinTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x41d9384dc97470bd2afa06db0c1be4f872519eec.sol#366-397) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x41d9384dc97470bd2afa06db0c1be4f872519eec.sol#392-393)

FollowCoinTokenSale.sendTokensBackToWallet (/unique_contracts/0x41d9384dc97470bd2afa06db0c1be4f872519eec.sol#402-404) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(multisig,tokenReward.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_contracts/0x41d9384dc97470bd2afa06db0c1be4f872519eec.sol)

Reentrancy in FollowCoinTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x41d9384dc97470bd2afa06db0c1be4f872519eec.sol#366-397):
	External calls:
	- tokenReward.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_contracts/0x41d9384dc97470bd2afa06db0c1be4f872519eec.sol#388-392)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investorCount (/unique_contracts/0x41d9384dc97470bd2afa06db0c1be4f872519eec.sol#392)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x41d9384dc97470bd2afa06db0c1be4f872519eec.sol#65-73) should be declared external
